## Source: amazon-inspector (98e288816b28da06174dcb7d9315fb857fc7daf80f81a57de2fbe1b0a3419895)
The package libxmljs2qwerty was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2d91988ba951c71566b9b39a2279ab047bd3e9233e58720bf517d55bd2170fee)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'libxmljs2qwerty' @ 0.30.30 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
